Package aom.scripting.ui.console

Class Selection

Object
Selection
public class Selection
extends Object
This class provides a collection of Console commands concerning Selections and Finding Units.
Author:
Mythic_Freak - mythic.freak[a]gmail.com
Local Call
[@local Selection commands are all local. Of course certain Auto Sync commands pass along the currently selected unit, but the actual UI selection process is completely local.]

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void uiAddSelectionButtonDown()
    Indicates that the add selection button has been pressed.
    void uiAddSelectionButtonUp()
    Indicates that the add selection button has been released.
    void uiClearSelection()
    Deselects all selected units.
    void uiDoubleClickSelect​(int add, bool checkAction)
    Double click select at pointer location.
    void uiFindIdleType​(string typeName)
    Finds the next idle unit of the given type in the arbitrary order of unit ID, so that it can be called repeatedly to cycle.
    void uiFindTownBellTC()
    Finds the next town center that has the town bell active, so that it can be called repeatedly to cycle.
    void uiFindType​(string typeName)
    Finds the next unit (idle or not) of the given type in the arbitrary order of unit ID, so that it can be called repeatedly to cycle.
    void uiMoveSelectionAddButtonDown()
    Indicates that selection button has been pressed.
    void uiMoveSelectionAddButtonUp()
    Indicates that selection button has been released.
    void uiMoveSelectionButtonDown()
    Indicates that selection button has been pressed.
    void uiMoveSelectionButtonUp()
    Indicates that selection button has been released.
    void uiSelectionButtonDown()
    Indicates that selection button has been pressed.
    void uiSelectionButtonUp()
    Indicates that selection button has been released.
    void uiSelectWaterAtPointer()
    Selects water at pointer location.
    void uiToggleSelectionButton()
    Toggles the selection button state (pressed or not).
    void uiUnSelectWater()
    Deselects currently selected water.

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • uiSelectionButtonDown

      public void uiSelectionButtonDown()
      Indicates that selection button has been pressed. When activated, a white selection rectangle is drawn on the screen, allowing the player to select multiple units.

    • uiSelectionButtonUp

      public void uiSelectionButtonUp()
      Indicates that selection button has been released. When released, the selection rectangle disappears.

    • uiDoubleClickSelect

      public void uiDoubleClickSelect​(int add, bool checkAction)
      Double click select at pointer location. A doubleclick action selects all units of the same type as the unit under the pointer.
      Parameters:
      add - If add == 1, the previous selected is extended with this selection. Else, the previous selection is dropped.
      checkAction - When checkAction is true, only units that are performing the same action (idle, moving, ...) are selected.

    • uiAddSelectionButtonDown

      public void uiAddSelectionButtonDown()
      Indicates that the add selection button has been pressed.

    • uiAddSelectionButtonUp

      public void uiAddSelectionButtonUp()
      Indicates that the add selection button has been released.

    • uiToggleSelectionButton

      public void uiToggleSelectionButton()
      Toggles the selection button state (pressed or not).

    • uiMoveSelectionButtonDown

      public void uiMoveSelectionButtonDown()
      Indicates that selection button has been pressed.

    • uiMoveSelectionButtonUp

      public void uiMoveSelectionButtonUp()
      Indicates that selection button has been released.

    • uiMoveSelectionAddButtonDown

      public void uiMoveSelectionAddButtonDown()
      Indicates that selection button has been pressed.

    • uiMoveSelectionAddButtonUp

      public void uiMoveSelectionAddButtonUp()
      Indicates that selection button has been released.

    • uiSelectWaterAtPointer

      public void uiSelectWaterAtPointer()
      Selects water at pointer location.
      Editor Mode Only
      [@editor ]

    • uiUnSelectWater

      public void uiUnSelectWater()
      Deselects currently selected water.
      Editor Mode Only
      [@editor ]

    • uiClearSelection

      public void uiClearSelection()
      Deselects all selected units.

    • uiFindIdleType

      public void uiFindIdleType​(string typeName)
      Finds the next idle unit of the given type in the arbitrary order of unit ID, so that it can be called repeatedly to cycle.

    • uiFindTownBellTC

      public void uiFindTownBellTC()
      Finds the next town center that has the town bell active, so that it can be called repeatedly to cycle.

    • uiFindType

      public void uiFindType​(string typeName)
      Finds the next unit (idle or not) of the given type in the arbitrary order of unit ID, so that it can be called repeatedly to cycle.
